main event: Edward S. Wagner observed a bright light in the sky over the ocean off Westhampton Beach, which appeared stationary before moving horizontally at high speed, then hovering, and finally disappearing vertically.
interesting points: The sighting took place at approximately 10:30 PM EDT on a clear night., The light was larger than a star and brighter than the surrounding stars., The sighting was reported to the Suffolk County Police Department and Project Blue Book., The observer was from Hampton Bays, New York., The report was submitted as a confidential document to Project Blue Book, U.S. Air Force.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
location: Westhampton Beach, Long Island, New York
witness description: Edward S. Wagner from Hampton Bays, New York
